summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Blockchain Analyzer - Token Universe (Stage B), Rankings & Buckets (Stage D), Dashboard (Stage E), and ML Toggle (P0). All backend APIs working correctly. Frontend pages load with proper light theme and all interactive elements functional.
seed_data_creation: Token Universe has 41 tokens synced from CoinGecko. Rankings computed with BUY=1, WATCH=19, SELL=21 tokens.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Stage B/D/E features and P0 ML Toggle are working. Backend APIs tested: /api/tokens/stats, /api/tokens, /api/rankings/buckets, /api/rankings/dashboard, /api/rankings/compute, /api/engine/ml/runtime (GET/POST). Frontend pages tested: /settings (ML Toggle with light theme), /rankings (3 bucket tables). Header navigation has Rankings link and Settings gear icon. 18 pytest tests all passing.

token_universe_api.GET /api/tokens/top: PASS - Top tokens by market cap
